story.title: Our Story
content: Founded right here in Utah with a simple mission: to provide homeowners with reliable, professional pool and spa services they can trust. We understand that your pool and spa are essential parts of your home enjoyment, and we treat them with the care and expertise they deserve.

The Hot Pool Boys team combines industry expertise with a commitment to customer satisfaction. We believe in delivering crystal-clear results and maintaining your water features to the highest standards, always standing behind our services with a 100% satisfaction guarantee.

As your local pool and spa care experts, we're personally invested in ensuring your aquatic spaces are perfectly maintained. When you choose The Hot Pool Boys, you're partnering with dedicated professionals who understand the unique needs of Utah pool and spa owners.

values.title: Why Wisconsin Chooses PureVue
values.subtitle: We're committed to excellence in every aspect of our Milwaukee and Wisconsin exterior cleaning and painting services

items.title: Licensed & Insured
items.description: Fully licensed Wisconsin professionals with comprehensive insurance coverage for complete peace of mind for all our cleaning and painting services.

items.title: Reliable Service
items.description: Punctual, professional service with flexible scheduling to fit your busy Wisconsin lifestyle. We arrive on time and deliver results that exceed expectations.

items.title: Satisfaction Guarantee
items.description: 100% satisfaction guarantee on all our Wisconsin exterior cleaning and painting services. If you're not happy, we'll make it right.

items.title: Local Community Focus
items.description: Student-powered business deeply rooted in the Wisconsin community, invested in your satisfaction and in developing the next generation of professionals.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Professional exterior cleaning and painting specialists dedicated to serving the Wisconsin community

members.name: Will
members.title: Owner
members.description:
Born and raised in Utah, I’ve always loved the changing seasons—especially summer, with winter coming in as a close second. Whether it’s diving into a cool pool on a scorching day or unwinding in a hot tub on a snowy night, I know how important it is to keep your water amenities in perfect shape all year round.

That’s why I make pool and spa care effortless. From balancing chemicals to tackling stubborn grime, I ensure every pool and spa is crystal-clear, stress-free, and ready for your next soak or swim. My goal? To deliver expert service with a touch of personality—because great maintenance should come with a friendly face.

"There’s always a chance you could catch me taking a quick dip before I head out—but don’t worry, I promise I’ll be out before you notice!"

members.name: Vinny
members.title: Service Tech
members.description:
Born and raised in the Salt Lake Valley, I spend my time fine-tuning two things: my car and your pool. My ride ensures I get to your service on time and out before you notice—though, let’s be real, you’ll probably hear me a mile away. 

As for the gym, that’s where I train for the real challenge—battling grime and gunk in your pool or spa. Thanks to my dedication (and maybe a few extra arm days), your water stays pristine.

The Hot Pool Boys bring muscle, precision, and top-tier service—so you can sit back, relax, and enjoy the splash!
